hadith.chapter: Dialects and Readings of the Qur'an (Kitab Al-Huruf Wa Al-Qira'at) - كتاب الحروف والقراءات
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا جعفر بن مسافر، حدثنا ابن أبي فديك، عن هشام بن سعد، بإسناده مثله ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Hisham b. Sa'd with a different chain of narrators in a similar way.
